attributes.action: abolish road tax in favour of the new vehicle tracking and road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should a OAP who drives 10 miles a week to get their shopping have to pay a road tax and then road usage on top? Shouldnt it be those who drive more pay more, if we go with this policy then theres no need for road tax as more money will be raised by the new taxation
